<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Student of Perfection Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=900) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 83 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Student of Perfection](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=18)

**Prerequisites**
[powerful fist](/Classes.aspx?ID=8) or expert in unarmed attacks; member of a House of Perfection

**Access**
You are from Jalmeray.

</column>

---

You have learned the martial arts techniques of your House of Perfection. You become trained in your choice of [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) or [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) and Warfare [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8); if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You gain the [Ki Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=433) monk class feat, which grants you the [_ki strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=486) ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the Refocus activity as a monk does. Your ki spells from Student of Perfection are occult spells.

**Special** You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the student of perfection archetype.

<title level="2">Student of Perfection Dedication leads to...</title>
[Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2198), [Perfect Ki Adept](/Feats.aspx?ID=902), [Perfect Ki Exemplar](/Feats.aspx?ID=4062), [Perfect Ki Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=4061), [Perfect Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4060), [Perfect Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=901), [Perfect Weaponry](/Feats.aspx?ID=4059)
